original_text:
Do you indeed decree what is right, you gods?
    Do you judge the children of man uprightly?
korean_text: 통치자들아 너희가 정의를 말해야 하거늘 어찌 잠잠하냐 인자들아 너희가 올바르게 판결해야 하거늘 어찌 잠잠하냐

sentences.original_text: Do you indeed decree what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 참으로 올바른 것을 법령으로 정하느냐

sentences.original_text: Do you judge the children of man uprightly?
